Name: Urban Legend: Lost in the Fog Tunnel
Description: Deep in the station tunnel, an urban legend takes shape. The thick fog, the extra side path… are these real phenomena, or just idle gossip? Gather your courage and go take a look!
QuestDesc: Deep in the station tunnel, an urban legend takes shape. The thick fog, the extra side path… are these real phenomena, or just idle gossip? Gather your courage and go take a look!

Dialogues.Speaker: Exhausted Employee
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yeah. Every night it rolls in thicker, like it's trying to swallow you whole. No one knows where it comes from.

Dialogues.Speaker: Frustrated Employee
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But they're pushing the schedule next month, right? Even supervisors are getting mandatory overtime… If it's just fog, maybe we can tough it out?

Dialogues.Speaker: Exhausted Employee
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh. You got a death wish, kid?

Dialogues.Speaker: Exhausted Employee
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's not the fog. It's the side path in the fog. You can't find or see it during the day, but once night falls… folks who wander down it don't come back.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exhausted Employee
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Worst part is, when the fog gets that thick, you don't even realize you've started walking down it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exhausted Employee
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So quit dawdling. Get your stuff and get home before dark.

Dialogues.Speaker: Frustrated Employee
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're giving me chills… Hey, this isn't just some trick you made up to avoid overtime, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Exhausted Employee
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Heh. If you wanna be a model worker, be my guest. Me? I'm leaving on time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Frustrated Employee
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, wait! I'm coming with you! Don't leave me here alone!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (This "side path" they talked about… Is this really it? But it looks completely normal…)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Was that my imagination? Did the light just flicker?)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Wait, that figure under the streetlamp... Is that…?)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Mayo? What are you doing here?

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You. Have. Arrived... I. Have. Been. Waiting. For. A. Very. Long. Time.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Stare long enough into the paranormal, and the paranormal... will stare back at you.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Was that really Mayo? I should try calling her. Please pick up… Mayo...)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You try contacting her, but no one answers. Looks like she's busy.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Don't tell me she came to investigate alone… I need to catch up to her.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mayo? Is that you? Don't go any further! It's dange—!

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's alright… I just have to be careful… Can't let it notice me…

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If it doesn't catch me… I-I can still make it out…

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have to… keep running… If I reach the end… maybe I can…

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Again…? Have I been here before…?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Who is it? What just happened?

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Shh. Don't talk. Listen. It's coming...

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Run. RUN! There's still time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One lamp, two lamps, three lamps… How many times has it been? I've lost count…

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So you're trapped here? I'll get you out.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Out…? No, I think I lost that chance a long time ago.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahaha, so that's how it is… I was never getting out in the first place, was I?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Is this it…? We've reached the end.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The end? No, this is where it begins.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's enough now... We're. Only. Just. Getting. Started.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's no escape. No escape—

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, it wasn't supposed to be like this… If only… I could…

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You… you run. Run for me...

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're fast… Much faster than I ever was.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mm. I'm fine. I just… can't go back.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It doesn't matter… not anymore.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If only I'd met you a little earlier… Maybe then I'd have found someone to walk this path with me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Young Girl That Looks like Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My story… ends here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Without confirming who she is, the girl offers you one last, sorrowful smile, and then dissolves into the wind.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}?! Finally! Your line's been busy this whole time!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Did you call me? Don't tell me you found a new urban legend?!

Options.PlotLineKey: (Brush it off and change the subject.)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I was in a tunnel with a thick fog that only appears at night, and... I saw you.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Everything was wrong. Inexplicable. And you... you got swallowed up. Left behind in there forever.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, so you figured it out, huh? Yeah, yeah, I vanished a long time ago—

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Did you actually think I'd say that?!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow, {PlayerName}! That's some top-tier storytelling! You almost had me convinced for a second!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But that's impossible! I've been in my dorm since this afternoon!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course! Why would I lie about that?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But this foggy tunnel… I swear I've heard an urban legend about it somewhere before, but where…?

Options.PlotLineKey: Either way, stay out of that place for now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hm? Sure thing! But you don't need to worry that much. Exploring the unknown is never easy, and I know the risks. And hey! I do value my life!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, nothing. Probably a misdial. Signal's terrible out here anyway.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What about you? Busy digging into your latest urban legend?

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nope! Swamped with coursework. Been stuck in my room all day. I haven't left my dorm since this afternoon! I guess the fan club's fate is in your capable hands now!

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Of course! Why would I lie about that?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (She sounds normal, and she seems like her usual self. But the one I saw in the tunnel… was that really not her?)

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Nothing. Get back to your work. Talk later.

Dialogues.Speaker: Mayo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hm? You sound super suspicious… Well, see you around, I guess?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The call ends. You turn to leave, unaware that deep within the tunnel behind you, a faint, flickering glow pulses in the growing dark as the fog begins to gather once more.
